00002 void dctbasis(double **BASIS,int blockResolution)
00003 {
00004 
00005         int blockSize = blockResolution*blockResolution;
00006         
00007                         
00008         double pi = atan( 1.0 ) * 4.0;
00009 
00010         
00011 
00012 
00013         for (int l=0;l<blockResolution;l++)
00014         for (int k=0;k<blockResolution;k++)
00015         {
00016                 double *phi = new double[blockSize];
00017                 for (int i=0;i<blockSize;i++)
00018                         phi[i] = 0;
00019                         
00020                 for (int x1=0;x1<blockResolution;x1++)
00021                         for (int x2=0;x2<blockResolution;x2++)
00022                         {
00023                 
00024                                 phi[x2+x1*blockResolution] =phi[x2+x1*blockResolution] + cos( (2*x1 +1)*l*pi/(2*blockResolution))*cos( (2*x2 +1)*k*pi/(2*blockResolution));
00025                         }
00026                                 
00027                  if ((l==0) || (k==0))
00028                                 for (int i=0;i<blockSize;i++)
00029                                         phi[i] = phi[i]/2;
00030

00032                         BASIS[rows][k+l*blockResolution] = phi[rows];

00035         }
